function.name: refrigeratorOption_turnOn
function.description: This function is used to turn on a specified option of a refrigerator.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the specified option of the refrigerator.

mode.description: The option to be turned on on the refrigerator (e.g., welcome light).
